name: Catchy Fox
description:
Catchy Fox is my first game developped in Gamemaker Studio 2.

I learned a lot while developing this project, both in terms of GML code and drawing on graphics tablet.

It's just a little arcade-scoring game where a fox has to catch the more eggs as possible. The controls are really simple :

Q - D = Move left and right

Esc = Quit the game at any moment

E = Go back to title screen

Hope you'll enjoy it! Leave a comment ;)
